Generally clear PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



A distanceeducation professor at East Carolina University is the recipient of one of the most prestigious teaching honors in the state PERIOD

Abbie Brown a professor of instructional technology in the College of Education has been selected to receive the University of North Carolina Board of Governors Award for Teaching Excellence PERIOD

Teaching entirely online he is the first onlineonly professor at the university to receive the award and is the first in the UNC system according to ECU News Services PERIOD

The Board of Governors Award for Excellence in Teaching coordinated by the Office of the Provost and the Office of Faculty Development was established to highlight the importance of teaching and to encourage identify recognize reward and support good teaching within the university PERIOD

I think in some ways this recognizes the entire universitys effort in providing a quality online experience he said PERIOD It kind of is a nice acknowledgment of how online teaching has become a very viable way both to teach people and to develop a learning community with people. today ECU offers more than  degrees and certificates online in fields such as education business health care and technology among others PERIOD The universitys online graduate programs in nursing and business have been named among the best in the country PERIOD

Browns teaching focuses on online distance education instructional media production and the professional development of instructional designers PERIOD Of the courses he administers several of them concentrate on teaching the teachers about distance education programs PERIOD

Mike Dixon an instructional technology consultant in the College of Fine Arts and Communication was a student of Browns students when he was completing a second masters degree from  PERIOD He described Brown as completely dedicated to his students PERIOD

I was just really impressed by the organization of his courses and the customization he would do for individuals said Dixon who also teaches online courses at the university PERIOD Ive taken a lot from his lead in my teaching. brown a native of New York City received his undergraduate degree in communication and theater arts from Temple University in Philadelphia and worked in the entertainment industry for several years before becoming an elementary and middle school teacher PERIOD

Using his theater background he created computerized instructional vignettes for his students which started him on the path of instructional technology according to ECU News Services PERIOD

I have developed very strong relationships with students that have lasted many years he said PERIOD There has been laughing and crying PERIOD Many times I meet my students for the first time facetoface at graduation PERIOD

Brown also earned a masters degree from Columbia University in New York and a doctorate in instructional systems technology from Indiana University PERIOD Before coming to ECU in  he taught at Washington State University and California State University Fullerton PERIOD

I came to ECU because of the strong faculty here in instructional technology and I wanted to become a part of that faculty Brown said PERIOD

Since  Brown has taught online and for three years was the editorinchief of the journal TechTrends PERIOD He has received several other awards for teaching and scholarship from organizations such as California State University and the New Jersey department of Education PERIOD Brown is also the author of numerous articles and books including The Essentials of Instructional Design PERIOD

I love my job Brown said PERIOD I wake up everyday counting my blessings that I get to do this for a living. the UNC Board of Governors selects a recipient from each of the systems  campuses PERIOD Each award winner will receive a commemorative bronze medallion and a  cash prize PERIOD A Board of Governors member will present all awards during each campus spring graduation ceremonies PERIOD









This is a really cool news and i havent read such type of news before PERIOD We can find many other useful news and the ukbesteessays.com service is simply a great website PERIOD I believe that people should read such type of news blogs to know about the things happening in the world PERIOD
